scriptlet.name: Operation Send SLA2 Email to Admin (80dbbd61-952d-40f5-89ee-4b15445b30c7)

staticBinding.value: [SLA${SLA}] Virtual Machine '${server.hostname}' has just been provisioned
A new SLA${SLA} Virtual Machine '${server.hostname}' has just been provisioned. This is a reminder that you go and manually perform the post-configuration in vCenter.
[SLA${SLA}] To Virtual Machine '${server.hostname}' a new Disk has just been added.
A new Disk has been added to SLA${SLA} Virtual Machine '${server.hostname}' . This is a reminder that you go and manually perform the post-configuration in vCenter.
[SLA${SLA}] Physical Machine '${server.hostname}' has just been provisioned
A new SLA${SLA} Physical Machine '${server.hostname}' has just been provisioned. This is a reminder that you go and manually perform the post-configuration.
[SLA${SLA}] To Physical Machine '${server.hostname}' a new Disk has just been added
A new Disk has been added to SLA${SLA} Physical Machine '${server.hostname}' . This is a reminder that you go and manually perform the post-configuration.
